actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to expand the authority for the bringing of suits for redress for violations relating to unfair or deceptive acts or practices by authorizing suits to be brought by persons, partnerships, and corporations injured by such violations.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Trade Commission Act to authorize persons, partnerships, and corporations which are injured by unfair or deceptive acts or practices to bring suit for the redress of such injury.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Trade Commission Act to expand the authority for the bringing of suits for redress for violations relating to unfair or deceptive acts or practices by authorizing suits to be brought by persons, partnerships, and corporations injured by such violations.
